message: I love how any counter to Nancy's claims are """"hateful"""" or """"negative"""". She posts a couple of anecdotal items she believes Trump is """"fixing"""", Kim responds with details and questions and it's """"negative"""" and """"hateful"""" and she isn't discussing """"facts"""". And yet anyone who doesn't support or believe a word Trump says has filters over THEIR ears. That's some serious cognitive dissonance and projection, Nancy. Just because you enjoy being gaslit doesn't mean the rest of us are too stupid to realize what's happening.

@ ...You don't know the difference between work and home. No company should owe you any such thing. Places to pump and fridges to store your milk...yes, right! LMAO! Work is work and not a place to take care of this kind of nonsense. You and people just like you are ruining this country with your idiotic demands and entitled attitudes.
